/usr/bin/c++    -rdynamic CMakeFiles/stereo_movie.dir/stereosgm_movie.cpp.o CMakeFiles/stereo_movie.dir/demo.cpp.o CMakeFiles/stereo_movie.dir/renderer.cpp.o CMakeFiles/stereo_movie.dir/stereo_movie_generated_cuda_gl.cu.o  -o stereo_movie  -L/opt/opencv/lib -Wl,-rpath,/opt/opencv/lib:/usr/local/cuda/lib64:/home/comp/qiangwang/software/lib /usr/local/cuda/lib64/libcudart_static.a -lpthread -ldl -lrt ../../src/libsgm.a /usr/local/cuda/lib64/libcudart_static.a -lpthread -ldl -lrt /usr/local/cuda/lib64/libnppi.so /home/comp/qiangwang/software/lib/libGLEW.so /home/comp/qiangwang/software/lib/libglfw.so -lXrandr -lXxf86vm -lXcursor -lXinerama -lpthread -lrt -lXi -lGLU -lGL -ldl -lrt
